data.lyric:
[ti:Coming Home]
[ar:Keith Urban/Julia Michaels]
[al:Coming Home]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.42]Coming Home - Keith Urban (凯斯·厄本)/Julia Michaels (尤莉娅·迈克尔丝)
[00:01.33]
[00:17.39]Keith Urban：
[00:17.96]
[00:20.52]I wake up feeling
[00:22.59]
[00:23.13]In my soul I'm
[00:25.56]Living someone else's life
[00:28.30]
[00:30.58]I'm turnin' into concrete
[00:32.89]Harder than these city streets
[00:34.87]Where no one even cares if I'm alive
[00:37.79]
[00:39.11]I gotta get it right mhm
[00:43.00]
[00:44.51]Get it right mhm
[00:48.37]
[00:49.70]There's a place that I know where they all know me
[00:51.99]I gotta get back now to the ones who love me
[00:55.05]Wrap myself around you never let you go
[00:57.12]There's nothin' in the world that feels like
[00:59.85]The place that I know where they all know me
[01:02.05]I gotta get back now to the ones who love me
[01:04.88]Wrap myself around you never let you go
[01:07.07]There's nothin' in the world that feels like
[01:09.53]Coming home
[01:10.71]
[01:12.59]Home home
[01:15.92]
[01:19.55]Coming home
[01:20.41]My mind's heavy and I can't sleep
[01:22.75]Not even a memory is good enough
[01:26.11]To get me through the night
[01:27.89]
[01:30.52]I'm longin' for the real thing
[01:32.88]People who know the real me
[01:34.96]And all the ways to love me back to life
[01:38.00]
[01:38.66]Mhm I gotta get it right ooh yeah
[01:42.81]
[01:44.44]Get it right ooh yeah
[01:47.70]
[01:49.64]There's a place that I know where they all know me
[01:52.03]I gotta get back now to the ones who love me
[01:54.93]Wrap myself around you never let you go
[01:57.12]There's nothin' in the world that feels like
[01:59.96]The place that I know where they all know me
[02:01.98]I gotta get back now to the ones who love me
[02:04.90]Wrap myself around you never let you go
[02:07.34]There's nothin' in the world that feels like
[02:09.47]Coming home
[02:10.81]
[02:12.69]Home home
[02:15.73]
[02:19.43]Coming home
[02:20.72]
[02:22.85]Home home
[02:25.71]
[02:29.51]Coming home
[02:30.35]Julia Michaels：
[02:30.70]Yeah I know it's only one call away
[02:32.71]But it's not the same
[02:34.28]
[02:35.21]Yeah I know it's only one call away
[02:37.69]But it's not the same
[02:38.84]Keith Urban：
[02:39.31]Just not the same
[02:40.15]Julia Michaels：
[02:40.58]Yeah I know it's only one call away
[02:42.75]But it's not the same
[02:44.05]Keith Urban：
[02:44.44]It's not the same
[02:45.19]Julia Michaels：
[02:45.62]Yeah I know it's only one call away
[02:47.66]But it's not the same
[02:48.97]Julia Michaels：
[02:49.65]There's a place that I know where they all know me
[02:52.07]I gotta get back now to the ones who love me
[02:54.80]Wrap myself around you never let you go
[02:57.06]There's nothin' in the world that feels like
[02:59.78]The place that I know where they all know me
[03:01.97]I gotta get back now
[03:03.28]Julia Michaels：
[03:03.71]To the ones who love me
[03:04.85]Keith Urban：
[03:05.30]Wrap myself around you never let you go
[03:06.99]There's nothin' in the world that feels like
[03:09.22]Coming home
[03:10.73]I'm feeling lost in all the madness
[03:15.02]I need somewhere to ease my mind
[03:19.33]Julia Michaels：
[03:19.75]Coming home
[03:20.37]Keith Urban：
[03:20.96]The sidewalks filled with different faces
[03:25.10]So many place but there's none like mine
[03:29.52]Coming home
data.trans:
[ti:Coming Home]
[ar:Keith Urban/Julia Michaels]
[al:Coming Home]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.42]//
[00:01.33]
[00:17.39]//
[00:17.96]
[00:20.52]我一觉醒来
[00:22.59]
[00:23.13]感觉在我灵魂深处
[00:25.56]我正过着别人的人生
[00:28.30]
[00:30.58]我变得铁石心肠
[00:32.89]比这城市的街道还要坚硬
[00:34.87]但根本没人在乎我是否活着
[00:37.79]
[00:39.11]我要让一切回归正轨
[00:43.00]
[00:44.51]让一切回归正轨
[00:48.37]
[00:49.70]我知道有一个地方 那里所有人都认识我
[00:51.99]现在我要回到那些爱我的人的怀抱
[00:55.05]围绕在你身边 绝不让你离开
[00:57.12]这世上没有一个地方让我感觉
[00:59.85]像那个所有人都认识我的地方
[01:02.05]现在我要回到那些爱我的人的怀抱
[01:04.88]围绕在你身边 绝不让你离开
[01:07.07]这世上没有一个地方让我感觉像是
[01:09.53]回到家乡
[01:10.71]
[01:12.59]家乡 家乡
[01:15.92]
[01:19.55]回到家乡
[01:20.41]我心事重重 无法入睡
[01:22.75]脑海中没有美好的回忆
[01:26.11]让我熬过这漫长黑夜
[01:27.89]
[01:30.52]我渴望那些真情实意
[01:32.88]那些真正了解我的人
[01:34.96]和那些一直爱我的人
[01:38.00]
[01:38.66]我要让一切回归正轨
[01:42.81]
[01:44.44]让一切回归正轨
[01:47.70]
[01:49.64]我知道有一个地方 那里所有人都认识我
[01:52.03]现在我要回到那些爱我的人的怀抱
[01:54.93]围绕在你身边 绝不让你离开
[01:57.12]这世上没有一个地方让我感觉
[01:59.96]像那个所有人都认识我的地方
[02:01.98]现在我要回到那些爱我的人的怀抱
[02:04.90]围绕在你身边 绝不让你离开
[02:07.34]这世上没有一个地方让我感觉像是
[02:09.47]回到家乡
[02:10.81]
[02:12.69]家乡 家乡
[02:15.73]
[02:19.43]回到家乡
[02:20.72]
[02:22.85]家乡 家乡
[02:25.71]
[02:29.51]回到家乡
[02:30.35]//
[02:30.70]我知道随时都能打通电话
[02:32.71]但这感觉完全不同
[02:34.28]
[02:35.21]我知道随时都能打通电话
[02:37.69]但这感觉完全不同
[02:38.84]//
[02:39.31]完全不同

[02:54.80]围绕在你身边 绝不让你离开
[02:57.06]这世上没有一个地方让我感觉
[02:59.78]像那个所有人都认识我的地方
[03:01.97]现在我要回到
[03:03.28]//
[03:03.71]那些爱我的人的怀抱
[03:04.85]//
[03:05.30]围绕在你身边 绝不让你离开
[03:06.99]这世上没有一个地方让我感觉像是
[03:09.22]回到家乡
[03:10.73]我在疯狂中渐渐迷失
[03:15.02]我需要一个让我放松的地方
[03:19.33]//

[03:20.37]//
[03:20.96]路边有各种各样的面孔
[03:25.10]那么多地方 但没有一个像我的家乡
[03:29.52]回到家乡
